Creates a link that pops up a Wiki page in a layer
----
!!Parameters
* showPage - the page to display
* text -  the text to show as a popup link
* asIFrame - optional true or false - show the page in an iframe
----
!!Usage:
{{{
[{Popup showPage="/OpenForum/Extensions" text="Extensions"}] 
[{Popup showPage="/OpenForum/Extensions" text="Extensions IFrame" asIFrame="true"}]
}}}
[{Popup showPage="/OpenForum/Extensions" text="Extensions"}] 
[{Popup showPage="/OpenForum/Extensions" text="Extensions IFrame" asIFrame="true"}]

----
